about._instruction: Add links to the datasets, models or software contained within or described by the creative work.

abstract._instruction: Enter the abstract of the creative work.

custodian._instruction: Enter the person or people responsible for the creative work (e.g. the corresponding author).

shortName._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this creative work (max. 30 characters; no space).

author._instruction: Add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this creative work.

citation._instruction: Add citations or references from this work to another creative work

copyright._instruction: Add the copyright information of this research product version.

creationDate._instruction: Enter the date on which the creative work was created.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date when this version of the creative work was published or uploaded to a preprint server.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

editor._instruction: Add one or more people who edited the creative work.

funding._instruction: Add all funding information of this creative work version.

fullName._instruction: Enter the full title of this creative work.

keyword._instruction: Add controlled or suggest new terms as keywords to this creative work

license._instruction: Add the license for this creativeWork.

publisher._instruction: Enter the person or organisation who/which published this version of the creative work.

IRI._instruction: Enter a URL at which this creative work is available.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this version of the creative work.
